attributes.action: ask his government to suggest to the BBC that they get someone better to produce Doctor Who
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most fans don't like the way that RTD has turned the character into a snoggomaniac. The Doctor is a hero not a sex maniac and we could all do with a return to the original humour with serious overtones and not just the plain stupidness that we have now

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
